attributes.action: Ban the use of maceration plants (rotating blades) for slaughtering live chicks.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A method of throwing live deformed chicks directly into a maceration machine (rotating blade) is an unacceptable & inhumane practice. The mass production of mutated poultry is a direct result of battery farming.

rejection.details: There is already a similar petition live: http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/Inhumaneculling/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
